about.title: This is me.
about.intro: Hello! I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over a decade of experience in the industry. I specialize in building scalable, sustainable software architectures and restructuring complex systems to enhance performance and maintainability.
about.expertise: While my core expertise lies in Angular, TypeScript, and NodeJS, I'm also deeply proficient in modern DevOps principles. I have hands-on experience migrating infrastructure using IaC tools like Terraform and Ansible, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and working extensively with containerization (Docker).
about.mentoring_accessibility: Beyond the code, I am passionate about fostering technical excellence in teams. I enjoy mentoring fellow developers and serving as the communication bridge between engineering, UI/UX designers, and product owners. I am also a dedicated advocate for web accessibility, with deep knowledge of implementing applications that meet stringent WCAG standards.
about.outro: I'm always open to discussing new challenges or collaborating on interesting projects. Feel free to get in touch or connect with me on LinkedIn.
